titles.title: A bill to extend the authority for the establishment of a commemorative work in honor of Gold Star Families, and for other purposes.
Gold Star Families National Monument Extension Act
Gold Star Families National Monument Extension Act
Gold Star Families National Monument Extension Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Gold Star Families National Monument Extension Act
This bill extends through January 2, 2027, the authority of the Gold Star Mothers National Monument Foundation to establish a commemorative work in honor of Gold Star families.
